Class ConsoleUI

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.poker.client.ConsoleUI
public class ConsoleUI extends Object
Handles the Text User Interface (TUI) for the Poker Client.

This class is responsible for rendering the game dashboard, handling user input via Scanner, and formatting output using ANSI escape codes for colors and frames.

Synchronization: Output methods are synchronized to prevent text interleaving between the server listener thread and the user input thread.

      public ConsoleUI(InputStream in, PrintStream out)
      Constructs a UI with custom input and output streams. Useful for testing or redirecting I/O.
      Parameters:
      in - The input stream (e.g., System.in).
      out - The output stream (e.g., System.out).

  • Method Details

    • readLine

      public String readLine()
      Reads a line of text from the input stream.
      Returns:
      The trimmed string entered by the user, or null if the stream is closed.

    • printMessage

      public void printMessage(String msg)
      Prints a standard message to the console. Includes basic heuristics for coloring success or lobby messages.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to print.

    • printError

      public void printError(String msg)
      Prints an error message, prefixed with a red exclamation mark.
      Parameters:
      msg - The error description.

    • printDashboard

      public void printDashboard(ClientGameState state)
      Renders the complete game dashboard, including the frame, player stats, pot info, and current hand.
      Parameters:
      state - The current ClientGameState to render.

    • printHelp

      public void printHelp(ClientGameState state)
      Displays contextual help commands based on connection status.
      Parameters:
      state - The current game state.

    • printPrompt

      public void printPrompt()
      Prints the input prompt indicator (e.g. "> ").
